meaning_str.bing:
n. 足球运动
网络. 英式足球；足球比赛；足球鞋

英式足球；足球比赛；足球鞋

足球运动；足球比赛；足球游戏；足球（主要在美国和加拿大使用）

1.en: Knut was no longer the cuddly little teddy bear romping with a soccer ball, but a 245-pound eating machine.
1.cn: “克努特”已不再是当年那只爱玩足球的可爱的小泰迪熊，而变成了245磅重的食肉机器。

2.en: Chinese solar power company Yingli Green Energy Holding Co. is hoping this year's soccer World Cup will give it a leg up.
2.cn: 中国太阳能公司英利绿色能源控股有限公司（YingliGreenEnergyHoldingCo。）希望今年的足球世界杯能够助其一“腿”之力。

3.en: And I'll simply explain about each of the things that the soccer ball hit. That seemed like sort of a cheap shot.
3.cn: 而我来解释球弹到的不同东西。看起来像是个雕虫小技。

0.en: Hey. Hey Phoebs, what's happening? Oh, okay, murder, cancer, soccer teams eating each other in the Andes.
0.cn: 菲比，怎么了？谋杀，癌症，足球队在安地斯山脉吃来吃去。

1.en: We just have to accept that Lily has a soccer game and we all have to be there. You were supposed to make an excuse.
1.cn: 只要学着接受莉莉有足球比赛，我们都得去观赛就可以了，你早该找个借口的。

2.en: Ross, didn't you play soccer in High School? Oh no wait, that's right. You just organized their game schedules on your Commodore 64.
2.cn: 罗斯，你高中不是踢过足球吗？不对，你只是用“海军准将64型”游戏机帮他们排赛程表。

3.en: Come on! Have you seen what my kid can do? I mean, he dials phones, he eats tortilla chips. He plays soccer with the cartoon tiger!
3.cn: 得了吧？你有没有看过，跟我同组的小子有多厉害？他会拨电话、吃墨西哥脆片，还会与卡通老虎踢足球。

4.en: Let's say a young boy growing up in Rhode Island with six brothers pretending to go to soccer practice when he was really going to sewing class and reading Runway under the covers at night with a flashlight.
4.cn: 比方说一个生活在罗得岛上，有六个兄弟的男孩假装去参加足球训练，实际上却跑去参加缝纫课，晚上在被窝里用手电筒看《天桥》。

5.en: I know. I guess I am. Oh, my God, load up the Volvo, I want to be a soccer mom.
5.cn: 我想我是的。我的天，开着沃尔沃汽车，成为孩奴。

6.en: I'll bet you give all the other soccer moms a good scare with that pin that says Boo.
6.cn: 我相信你会别着一个写着"呸"的胸针，把别的"孩奴"妈妈吓一跳。
